class.name: AudioStreamPlaybackResampled
class.description: Playback class used to mix an [AudioStream]'s audio samples to [method AudioServer.get_mix_rate] using cubic interpolation.

method.name: _get_stream_sampling_rate
method.description: Returns an [AudioStream]'s sample rate, in Hz. Used to perform resampling.

method.name: _mix_resampled
method.description: Called by [method begin_resample] to mix an [AudioStream] to [method AudioServer.get_mix_rate]. Uses [method _get_stream_sampling_rate] as the source sample rate. Returns the number of mixed frames.

method.name: begin_resample
method.description: Called when an [AudioStream] is played. Clears the cubic interpolation history and starts mixing by calling [method _mix_resampled].
